summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Curly Hair Wave 1 Bundles 18 Inch 100% Unprocessed Kinky Curly Human Hair Bundles Extensions Natural Black Color Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: SnowHair Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SnowHair', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Product Dimensions': '4.8 x 1 x 0.4 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '682559651836'} Review Text: Excellent hair. I really enjoying it Review Title: I love this hair, very soft and natural Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Selina, Brazilian Curly Hair Bundles, 1 Bundle,cheap bundles, Kinky Curly, human hair bundles, Remy Hair bundles, virgin curly hair bundles, 100 Gram/Bundle (18", Natural Black) Review Date: 2020/09/07 Store: Selina Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Selina', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 2.6 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '824918169808'} Review Text: This hair was very soft and natural. Very thin but nice hair Review Title: Nice hair Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BeautyGirl Hair Brazilian Water Wave 4 Bundles 16 18 20 22inches Unprocessed Water Wave Curly Human Hair Weave Brazilian Water Wave Virgin Hair Bundles Natural Color Review Date: 2021/04/07 Store: BeautyGirl Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'BeautyGirl', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '10.94 x 7.68 x 2.76 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} Review Text: Your ad said Brazilian Water Wave human hair. This is not Human hair. I received a blend of synthetic hair. This was false advertisement. Not good.

Taylor Review Title: Very disappointment with this hair Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brazilian Kinky Weave Hair Virgin Hair Kinky Curly Remy Brazillian 100% Human Hair Weave Jerry Curly Virgin Remy Human Hair Bundles Brown Human Hair Weave kinky curly 18 20 22 Inch NIUDINNG Review Date: 2021/07/05 Store: NIUDINNG Average Rating: 1.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NIUDINNG', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '22 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Durable'} Review Text: Well, I have tried many of Amazon Weave hair and this was not a good selection. It was very thin and stringy, not good quality. I put one bundle on and I am sure it is not human hair. I returned the package back to the seller for a refund. Just my opinion Review Title: Brazilian Kinky weave hair is not as good as it looks Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NiegMeag 20 Inch Kinky Curly Bundles Wave 1 Human Hair 8A Grade 100% Brazilian Unprocessed Virgin Remy Extension Weave Natural Black Can Be Dyed and Bleached, Bundle Review Date: 2021/12/19 Store: NiegMeag Product Description: ["Hair Texture: Curly Wave Human Hair Bundles.Material: 100% Unprocessed Brazilian Human Hair.Human Hair Type: Brazilian Remy Human Hair. Weave Hair Human Bundles.Color: Natural Black ColorUnit Weight: 1 Bundles ,95-100g/piece.Hair Weft: Machine Double Wefts.Can Be Permed: Yes,But Please Be Careful Not to Exceed 125°F ! Otherwise it Will Damage The Hair !Hair Smell: It May Have Local Shampoo Smell, but It Will Disappear Fast After Co-Wash, Don'T Worry.How To Take Care Of The Hair?1. Wash The Hair Regularly.2. Detangle Hair Gently Before Washing. Do Not Rub or Twist It.3. Add Mild Shampoo To Cool Water and Swish Hair Till Clean. Rinse Thoroughly.4. Blot Out Excess Water With Towel and Allow Hair to Dry Naturally. Do Not Expose to The Sun.5. Comb Hair Gently With Wide Toothed Comb or With Your Fingers . 6. Brush Straighter Hair in a Downward Motion Straight With The Ends. FAQ:Q1: Will It Shedding?A1: For New Hair, A Few Strands of Hair Initial Shedding is Normal Like Our Own Hair. The Hair is Double Machine Weft to Avoid Shedding.Hair Shedding Can Be Caused by Many Things. Heat Damage From Blow-Dryers, Curling Irons, And Flatirons, As Well As Coloring Will Result in Breakage.Q2: Return/Refund Policy?A2: You Can Return to us if You or Your Family Doesnt Like Our Hair .But Don'T Break The Package."] Average Rating: 1.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NiegMeag', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'UPC': '679265464058'} Review Text: Very bad quality hair Review Title: Bad quality Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brazilian Hair Ombre Bundles Deep Wave Human Hair 3 Bundles T1B-4-27 Ombre Virgin Hair 3 Bundles 100G/Pcs Unprocessed Remy Human Hair Double Weft Weave Three Tone Light Brown Mix Blonde（16 18 20 Inch） Review Date: 2022/02/21 Store: Agnes Product Description: ["Choose Agnes Hair,Choose Rest Assured!We Are Located In Xuchang,Henan Province,China'S Factory;Global Wig Base,With More Than 20 Years Of Wig Production Experience!The Main Products Of The Factory Are Hair Bundles,Closure Front,Hair Wigs Etc Hair Material:100 Percent Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Ombre Highlight Bundles Material Grade: 10A Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles Hair Weft: Machine Double Weft Hair Advantage:Nature Look,Suit for Any Occasion Hair Color: Three Tone #T1b-4-27. Warm Tips: If There Is Any Requirement, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Before You Place Orders.We Will Send the Wig In Medium Cap Size and Medium Brown Cap Color If Not Receive Change Message QA: Q1:Is this 1100 Percent Human Hair A:Yes.Testing by BURNING- Human hair will show white smoke while burning and then turn to ash; Synthetic hair will show black smoke and will be a sticky ball after burning. Q2:Hair Smell A:1100 Percent chemical free,it may have local shampoo smell,but can be removed by cowashing with shampoo and conditioner. Q3: How long does it last A:This hair can last for long time depending on how you maintain it.Usually my customers use for more than a year.Contact Us To Explain The Suitable Use Method For You! Q4:How Many Bundles Do I need for A Full Head A:Normally 3 bundles is enough for the Full Head.If You Like Thicker or Need Longer Hair,It's Better to Wear one More Bundle."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Agnes', 'Color': 'brown', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '12.2 x 9.84 x 2.09 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'UPC': '735209921787'} Review Text: What I didn’t like about the hair is, I purchased deep wave and when I added it in m hair, it was loose wave. The bottom color of the hair is very blonde so you will have to tone it down with a light brown rinse. If you are looking for curly hair, look for the kinky curly in two tone . Review Title: Two tone weaving hair is ok Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 120 Pieces Face Lift Tapes with 9 Pieces Listing Ropes, Invisible Face Lifting Tapes and Bands, Double Chin Lifting Tape, Neck Lifting Patch, Skin Lifting Sticker for Women Review Date: 2022/03/17 Store: tchrules Average Rating: 2.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'tchrules', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '16.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '120', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 3.7 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} Review Text: I was ecstatic to receive my face lift tape but very disappointed. It comes off very easily especially in the hot weather. The tape doesn’t last but 30 minutes on your face. It will not stick if you apply makeup. Band not long enough Review Title: Not so great Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with several hair products, highlighting attributes like softness, natural appearance, and overall quality. High ratings were awarded to products that met expectations for texture and feel. The user appreciated the comfort of the hair extensions, noting their enjoyment and favorable experiences. Positive sentiments were tied to the products being true to their descriptions and providing a pleasant aesthetic.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
On the downside, the user encountered significant issues with multiple products. Complaints were centered around misrepresentation, particularly regarding the authenticity of materials, with some items failing to meet the expected quality for human hair. Reports of thin and stringy textures were frequent, leading to disappointment. Additionally, usability concerns arose with accessories failing to adhere properly under normal conditions, especially in adverse weather, resulting in a poor overall experience.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experiences reflect a mix of satisfaction and frustration. Positive reviews commend the softness and natural qualities of certain hair products, contributing to a pleasurable use. However, negative feedback emerged regarding several purchases, primarily focused on misrepresentation and quality concerns. These discrepancies indicate a need for improved accuracy in product descriptions and quality assurance. While there are favorable items in the user's history, negative experiences have also significantly impacted overall satisfaction.

target_interaction.title: Not human hair
target_interaction.text:
Company, I am so very disappointed. I am in an event tomorrow and as I was adding the hair in, I noticed that it was synthetic hair. I was so very angry and disappointed with this product. I had to leave it in for the event. Why would you advertise human hair when you are aware that it’s synthetic or a blend. It’s not fair to the customer. I will never purchase anything from tour company.

Taylor
target_interaction.title_meta: Dark Brown Brazilian Deep Wave Bundles 8A Deep Wave Human Hair Bundles Virgin Hair 3 Bundle 14 16 18 Inch 100% Unprocessed Human Hair 3 Bundle For Women
